cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 27th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 27th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A comfortable and cozy private room with a double bed. The room has a modern heating system and a sink in the room. All linen, toiletries and a towel are provided free of charge. Modern shared bathroom facilities are in the same corridor.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A comfortable and cozy private room with a comfortable bunk bed. The room has a modern heating system and a sink in the room. All linen, toiletries and a towel are provided free of charge. Modern shared bathroom facilities are in the same corridor.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 3 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A comfortable and cozy private room with a double bed and a bunk on top, sleeping up to 3 people. The room has a modern heating system and a sink in the room. All linen, toiletries and a towel are provided free of charge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A comfortable room with private en-suite bathroom. The room contains a queen bed and two bunk beds, sleeping up to 4 people. A self-regulating radiator keeps the room hot at all times.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

If you cancel after 23:59 27th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).
